data.client_settings: [BUILD INFO] Release Channel: canary, Build Number: 27458
data.actual_result: Notification Settings > Notification Overrides scroll bar is Edge-like
data.expected_result: The scroll bar is supposed to be regular like the Notification Settings
data.short_description: Notification Overrides scroll in light theme is Edge-like (generic Windows scroll bar)
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to User Settings - Go change your theme from Dark theme to Light theme in Appearance - Go to any Discord server - Right click on the server or just go to the server settings - Press on Notification Settings - Scroll down until you see Notification Overrides - Click on the scroll bar menu and you'll notice that the scroll bar for Notification Overrides is Edge-like (generic Microsoft scroll bar)
